text: Isn't it in the cta? It now has a style tab and HubSpot hides css in there which lookes like this.

Hi <@U07PS5ZNAE4> Is the last number in the function correct? I remember that this one was bothering me a lot. You should have the id's of the object, ths HubSpot_DEFINED or USER_DEFINED and the the number. The association type id.
You can find it via these options: The ID of the association definition to use. For standard HubSpot supported objects see <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/crm-associations/crm-associations-overview|ID of the association type to use>.
Otherwise, this association ID can found at the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/custom-objects#getting-a-custom-object-type-s-details|CRM Objects Schema API>.
